titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount that can be withdrawn without penalty from individual retirement plans as first-time homebuyer distributions.
First Time Homeowner Savings Plan Act
First Time Homeowner Savings Plan Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
First Time Homeowner Savings Plan Act
This bill increases from $10,000 to $25,000 the aggregate amount a taxpayer may withdraw, without penalty, from a tax-exempt retirement plan as a first-time homebuyer distribution.
